articles.content: It’s the little details that really make a gaming PC special. Sure, the newly-unveiled 2020 refresh of Acer’s Predator Orion 9000 mega desktop might have one of Intel’s Core i9 Extreme Edition CPUS a… [+3233 chars]

articles.author: Gabe Gurwin
articles.title: Crash Bandicoot 4: It's About Time Brings The 32-Bit Era Mascot Back To PS4 And Xbox One This Year - GameSpot
articles.description: Crash Bandicoot 4: It's About Time is the long-awaited sequel to the original trilogy, picking up where Warped left off.
articles.content: Crash Bandicoot has been missing in action for years at this point, with remastered versions of his past adventures and racing spin-offs keeping fans occupied. However, the time to wait is almost up,… [+1659 chars]
